getUserPermissions

private java.util.List<UserPermission> getUserPermissions(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                                          long userId,
                                                          boolean sortedByUser)
                                                   throws ServiceException
Parameters:
operation - Operation
userId - User identifier
sortedByUser - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by user
Returns:
List of permissions of an user (or all permissions of any user if user==0) optionally sorted by user
Throws:
ServiceException
